reflexivity_family.GRT_v1.0: Gold Reflexivity Tripwire — anticipatory bid on policy/inflation
reflexivity_family.Breadth_Feed_v1.1: Market Breadth & Liquidity Monitor — ETF flows, breadth ratios, VIX term

tier_map.Tier_1_Structural_Core: Foundational regime logic: MSI v2.0, TTL, KFT, EGI
tier_map.Tier_3_Reflexivity_Suite: Anticipatory feedback and liquidity sensors: GRT, CRB, Breadth Feed
tier_map.Tier_4_Meta_Governance: Mode logic and learning: Reflective Core, Rebalance Engine, Ledger

integration_notes.causality: Each module maps to unique domain, no circular triggers
integration_notes.latency_alignment: Weekly cadence default; Breadth Feed daily
integration_notes.feedback_symmetry: All deltas expressed in unified +x.x / -y% scale

notes: GRT, CRB, and Breadth Feed integrated; UPSM architecture upgraded to Reflexivity Suite vNext.
